docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, Aug. 27 -- An overwhelming majority of Latin-American foreign ministers -- possibly all of them except Cuba's representative -- agreed late tonight to condemn every form of Soviet and Chinese Communist intervention in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, Aug. 27 -- An overwhelming majority of Latin-American foreign ministers -- possibly all of them except Cuba's representative -- agreed late tonight to condemn every form of Soviet and Chinese Communist intervention in the Western Hemisphere.

headline.main: Washington Wins Backing For O.A.S. Stand on Reds; Condemnation of Soviet Offer of Arms Aid to Cuba Gets Support Among Latin Ministers at San Jose U.S. GETS BACKING FOR O.A.S. STAND

docs.snippet: ROME, Aug. 30 (AP) -- An official of the Philippines amateur athletic federation warned today that Asia might not send basketball players to future olympics and world meets unless something was done about the disparity in height among players of...
docs.lead_paragraph: ROME, Aug. 30 (AP) -- An official of the Philippines amateur athletic federation warned today that Asia might not send basketball players to future olympics and world meets unless something was done about the disparity in height among players of various nations.

headline.main: ASIA URGES 2 GROUPS IN BASKETBALL PLAY
